argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumcl.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | gsumcl.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumcl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) |
| 4 |  | gsumcl.a | |- ( ph -> A e. V ) |
| 5 |  | gsumcl.f | |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) |
| 6 |  | gsumcl.w | |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fsuppimpd | |- ( ph -> ( F supp .0. ) e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7 | #P_gsumcl2 | |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. B ) |
